ProteinName	Sialic acid-binding Ig-like lectin 8 (Siglec-8) (Sialoadhesin family member 2) (SAF-2)
GeneName	SIGLEC8 SAF2
Length	406
Function	Putative adhesion molecule that mediates sialic-acid dependent binding to blood cells (PubMed:10625619, PubMed:10856141). Preferentially binds to alpha-2,3-linked sialic acid. Also binds to alpha-2,6-linked sialic acid. The sialic acid recognition site may be masked by cis interactions with sialic acids on the same cell surface (PubMed:10625619). Recognizes simultaneously epitopes having a terminal N-acetylneuraminic acid (sialic acid) and an underlying 6-O-sulfated galactose. Preferentially binds to Gal-6-sulfated sialyl-Lewis X glycan epitopes (PubMed:27357658).
